pull.title: test: Make PORT_MIN in test runner configurable
pull.body:
This is needed when some ports in the port range are used by other processes. Note that simply assigning the ports dynamically does not work:

* We spin up several nodes per test (each node gets its own port)
* We run several tests in parallel

So to avoid nodes from different tests colliding on ports, the port assignment must be deterministic (can not be dynamic).

Fixes: #10869

issue.title: Customizable CIRRUS_HTTP_CACHE_HOST
issue.body:
The doc says that port 12321 will be used to start a caching server on localhost. (https://cirrus-ci.org/guide/writing-tasks/#http-cache)

Is there a way to disable it or assign it to a different port? Some test suites might use a large port range (e.g. from 10000 to 20000) and assume that none of the ports are taken.
